text:
How to reproduce:
 - Make sure you have selected the "System" theme
 - File -> Open or File -> Save
 - click the "Up one Level" button (the first one to the right of the "Look in" dropdown)

Expected behaviour:
 - parent directory opens always

Observed behaviour:
 - button does not work until you do some other action, like opening a subfolder (then the button will work for the whole tree again, and not only up to the level you stared at)

I think this was introduced in 2.5, but I am not sure :/
creator: immanuel.hayden@gmail.com

text: Not reproductible on Mac OSX System LAF.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
immanuel.hayden@gmail.com
text: JDK 1.7 bug it seems: http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=7019963 ... now I only have to figure out why jmeter uses the 1.7 jdk instead of the 1.6_30 jvm :/
